sentences: Harjuski müüdud pearätt oli hea kvaliteediga.
context: The word 'müüs' in Estonian refers to a historical wandering peddler or travelling salesman who sold goods door-to-door, primarily selling items in small quantities (pudukaupa) and also accepting trade for pig bristles. This was an occupation that existed in past centuries where these merchants would travel between rural areas selling various household items.
